name: Gruntfile
title: Gruntfile.coffee/js

content:
```
clean:
      src: ['public/compiled-js/']
```
purges files or directories

accepts strings, filepaths, regex
name: grunt-clean
title: grunt-contrib-clean

content:
##based on minispade.js (yehuda katz)
code adapted by 4south from rake-pipeline-web-filters minispade module
```
    minispade:
      options:
        renameRequire: true
        useStrict: false
        prefixToRemove: 'public/compiled-js/'
      files:
        src: ['public/compiled-js/**/*.js']
        dest: 'public/dist/app.js'
```
Wraps modules in minispade.register closures

replaces "require" with "minispade.require"
name: grunt-minispade
title: grunt-minispade

content:
compiles coffeescript files

optionally globs files into single output file

"bare" prevents cs closures

```
    coffee:
      options:
        bare: true
      glob_to_multiple:
        expand: true
        cwd: 'public/coffee/'
        src: ['**/*.coffee']
        dest: 'public/compiled-js'
        ext: '.js'
```
name: grunt-coffee
title: grunt-contrib-coffee

content:
compiles sass files

###sass files determine their own import schema###

```
@import "mySassFile.sass"
```
```
    sass:
      dist:
        options:
          trace: true
          style: 'expanded'
        files:
          'public/dist/appsass.css': 'public/sass/app.sass'
```
name: grunt-sass
title: grunt-contrib-sass

content:
##*not grunt-contrib-handlebars!

compiles .handlebars files

outputs .js file with Ember.TEMPLATES object

```
    ember_templates:
      compile:
        options:
          templateName: (sourceFile) ->
            return sourceFile.replace(/public\/handlebars\//,'')
        files:
          "public/dist/apptemplates.js": "public/handlebars/**/*.handlebars"
```
name: grunt-templates
title: grunt-ember-templates

content:
##replaces grunt-contrib-watch

expected to be a temporary issue only

watch files and perform tasks on change

```
    regarde:
      coffee:
        files: 'public/coffee/**/*.coffee'
        tasks: ['clean', 'coffee', 'minispade', 
                'livereload', 'regarde']
      handlebars:
        files: 'public/handlebars/**/*.handlebars'
        tasks: ['ember_templates', 'livereload',                'regarde']
      sass:
        files: 'public/sass/**/*.sass'
        tasks: ['sass', 'livereload', 'regarde']
```
name: grunt-regarde
title: grunt-regarde

<script

name: websockets
title: Ember-Data socket.io adapter

content:
##findAll "GET" example

```
  findAll: (store, type, since) ->
    @send
      store: store
      type: type
      since: @sinceQuery(since)
      requestType: TYPES.FIND_ALL
      callback: (req, res) ->
        Ember.run req.context, ->
          @didFindAll req.store, req.type, res

  //stubbed out 'send' method last line shown
    @socket.emit "ember-data", data
```
